channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1488] Steve Carell Does The Colbert Report (Video)
item.description: Steve Carell and Stephen Colbert were reunited last night on The Colbert Report, where they offered a glimpse of The Carell Corral and resurrected Even Stevphen.

item.title: [+1403] WSJ.com - Antibody Kills 91% of HIV Strains
item.description: In a significant step toward an AIDS vaccine, U.S. government scientists have discovered three powerful antibodies, the strongest of which neutralizes 91% of HIV strains, more than any AIDS antibody yet discovered.

item.title: [+1379] Images BP Doesn't Want You to See [GALLERY]
item.description: In the face of tightening media restrictions, a photographer documents the catastrophe in the Gulf.

item.title: [+1262] 80s style intro for Firefly
item.description: The original credits weren't bad, they just needed a little umph... here is that umph.

item.title: [+1126] Study: Marijuana Prices to Plummet If Legalized
item.description: Pot Could Go from Nearly $400 an Ounce to Around $40 In California If Legalization Measure Is Successful

item.title: [+1035] Boat [Old Spice Commercial]
item.description: Use Old Spice Body Wash and get ready for a manly moustache surprise.

item.title: [+952] Go sell scary somewhere else... (pic)
[+929] Snoop Dogg Tried To Rent Liechtenstein
item.description: Snoop is all about weed, hos, and small European principalities.

item.title: [+898] 15 Things You Didn't Know About Office Space
item.description: In honor of one of the greatest comedies of all time, put on your trivia hat and get some more flair.

item.title: [+815] Largest ever hoard of Roman coins Unearthed (Pics)
item.description: A treasure hunter armed with a metal detector has found 52,500 Roman coins, one of the largest finds of Roman coins in Britain.The hoard dates from the third century AD and was found buried in a field near Frome in Somerset.The coins were in a huge jar just over a foot below the surface and were located by Dave Crisp, 63, from Devizes...

item.title: [+760] Swedish Pirate Party to run the Pirate Bay from Parliament
item.description: Now the Pirate Party wants to take their stand even further, and plans to use a section of the Swedish Constitution to allow them to host the seemingly indefatigable TPB from inside Parliament.

item.title: [+615] Fish Found Walking in Gulf Spill
item.description: Two new species of fish have been seen walking at the site of the Gulf oil spill.

item.title: [+597] Damn Teenagers and their Freaky Hairdos
[+596] Claim your $16! Comcast P2P settlement now final
item.description: A three-year class-action lawsuit targeting Comcast's P2P blocking techniques has resulted in a $16 million payout fund. Comcast users who cop to using P2P can pick up $16 in the settlement.

item.title: [+552] You're Doing It Wrong [Pic]
[+538] Woman Dies From Heart Attack Because She Was Too Aroused
item.description: A young nanny's heart attack death as she was using a sex toy and watching pornography was most likely due to her state of sexual arousal, an inquest has heard. Nicola Paginton, 31, was found dead at her home in Cirencester, England, in October last year, The Sun reports.quest has heard.

item.title: [+528] Will Petraeus Change the Rules for Shooting Back?
item.description: U.S. soldiers in the guerrilla-ridden country gripe that the rules of engagement are confusing and may be putting them in greater danger

item.title: [+518] Pirate Bay Hacked
item.description: Hackers in Argentina have accessed the e-mail and IP addresses and usernames for more than four million Pirate Bay users.

item.title: [+508] Afghanistan: When Women Set Themselves on Fire
item.description: With little recourse outside of culture and tradition, despondent married women, some just teenagers, are turning to suicide by self-immolation

item.title: [+488] The Evolution of an M. Night Shyamalan Fan [CHART]
item.description: The Last Airbender is a film directed by M. Night Shyamalan, in much the same way that a steaming pile of crap on your lawn is "directed" by your dog's anus.
